#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,n,d,a,sum;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>d;
        sum=10*(n-1);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {cin>>a;sum+=a;}
        if(sum>d) cout<<-1<<endl;
        else cout<<2*(n-1)+(d-sum)/5<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
